response.original_title: Anthony Callea - Ladies & Gentlemen: The Songs of George Michael
response.overview: This concert and a tie-in live album by Anthony Callea serve as a tribute to the songs of George Michael; the title refers to Michael's 1998 greatest hits collection, Ladies & Gentlemen: The Best of George Michael. It was recorded and filmed live with a 9 piece band at The Palms at Crown in Melbourne on May 16, 2014.  The concert saw Callea perform with a number of artists, including a duet with Casey Donovan, whose appearance on stage to sing "I Knew You Were Waiting (For Me)" became a crowd favourite and marked the first time the pair had sung together since the Australian Idol finale in 2004.
response.title: Anthony Callea - Ladies & Gentlemen: The Songs of George Michael
